Reuni Tofu di The 90's Festival
06 Nov 2019, 09:45 by Windy Eka Pramudya
SETELAH belasan tahun berpisah, grup vokal Tofu akan reuni. Adalah The 90's Festival yang akan menghadirkan Tofu dengan formasi lengkap yaitu, Anton, Fla, Uya, dan Joeniar Arief. Tofu dijadwalkan tampil mengisi salah satu pentas The 90's Festival yang akan digelar 23-24 November 2019 di Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta.
Fla mengungkapkan, Tofu berhenti berkarya dan tampil sejak 2006. Setelah itu, hubungan para personel terjalin lewat telefon. Sejak lima tahun lalu, banyak yang menawarkan Tofu untuk reuni, tapi Fla dkk merasa belum siap karena kesibukan masing-masing personel.
"Di tahun ini The 90's Festival menghubungi saya lewat Instagram, mereka menawarkan untuk reuni. Kami pikir, ini saatnya untuk kembali kumpul dan tampil bersama lagi," tutur Fla pada jumpa wartawan The 90's Festival di Harris Vertu Harmoni Jakarta, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Fla mengaku, ketika bertemu lagi berempat, semua terasa menyenangkan. Mereka juga sudah mulai latihan sebagai persiapan tampil di The 90's Festival. Menurut Fla, walaupun sudah lama enggak nyanyi bareng, mereka tidak mendapat kesulitan. Hanya saja mereka sedikit lupa lirik.
Uniknya, reuni Tofu ini tidak hanya mempertemukan para personel. Akan tetapi, tim produksi serta para pemain band yang mendukung Tofu juga orang-orang lama yang selalu bekerja sama dengan Tofu.
"Jadi ini semuanya akan reuni, enggak hanya kami, tapi juga road manager, kru, dan additional player. Kami sengaja pakai orang-orang yang sama biar sudah tahu karakter musik Tofu. Dengan pakai tim yang sama, kami tinggal pemanasan," kata Fla.
Untuk The 90's Festival, Tofu telah menyiapkan sekitar delapan lagu untuk tampil selama 45 menit. Sebagai repertoar, Tofu memilih lagu-lagu yang ada video klipnya. Sebut saja Hidup Cuma Sekali, Cinta Semua, Biarkan Ku Sendiri, dan Mimpi Terindah. Mereka ingin para penonton The 90's Festival bisa bernostalgia dan bernyanyi bersama.
"Kami sudah latihan dua kali. Mungkin nanti menjelang tampil akan latihan dua kali lagi. Kami antusias untuk tampil di The 90's Festival, karena hampir 13 tahun enggak manggung bareng, malah kalau sama Uya, 16 tahun," ucap Fla.
Anton menyebutkan, kondisi personal awak Tofu memang sudah tak sama lagi. Dengan berat badan yang sudah naik, hal ini mempengaruhi ke kualitas suara dan napas. Namun, mereka senang bisa kembali bersama dan akan menampilkan performa terbaik.
"Kami kan kenal sejak berusia 17 tahun. Hubungan emosionalnya sudah dekat. Selain itu, Tofu kan pisahnya bukan karena berantem atau ada kemarahan. Jadi ketika kumpul lagi, ya kami senang," ucap Anton.
Setelah reuni, Tofu tidak menutup diri untuk merilis karya baru. Namun, untuk saat ini mereka belum merencanakan proyek anyar atau menyiapkan jadwal panggung yang padat.
"Kami sudah enggak bisa seperti dulu, karena setiap personel punya kesibukan. Apalagi, Arief juga tinggalnya di Semarang dan dia kerja kantoran," ujar Anton.Â 
Siap untuk reuni dan bersenang-senang bersama Tofu?***

Tofu Reunion at The 90's Festival
Nov 6 2019, 09:45 by Windy Eka Pramudya
After a dozen years apart, the vocal group Tofu will reunion. The 90's Festival will present Tofu in full formation, namely, Anton, Fla, Uya, and Joeniar Arief. Tofu is scheduled to perform in one of the performances of The 90's Festival, which will be held on November 23-24, 2019 at Gambir Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta.
Fla revealed, Tofu stopped working and appeared since 2006. After that, the relationship of the personnel established by telephone. Since five years ago, many have offered Tofu for a reunion, but Fla et al felt they were not ready because of the busy schedule of each personnel.
"This year The 90's Festival contacted me via Instagram, they offered to reunite. We think it's time to get back together and perform together again," Fla said at a reporter at The 90's Festival at Harris Vertu Harmoni Jakarta, Wednesday, November 6, 2019 .
Fla admitted, when we met again, the four of them felt good. They have also started training in preparation for performing at The 90's Festival. According to Fla, even though they haven't sung together for a long time, they don't get into trouble. It's just that they forgot the lyrics a little.
Uniquely, this Tofu reunion did not only bring together personnel. However, the production team and the band players who supported Tofu were also old people who always worked together with Tofu.
"So this will all be a reunion, not only us, but also the road manager, crew, and additional players. We deliberately use the same people to know the character of Tofu music. By using the same team, we just have to warm up," said Fla. .
For The 90's Festival, Tofu has prepared around eight songs to perform for 45 minutes. As a repertoire, Tofu chose songs with video clips. Just Call It Life Once, Love All, Leave Me Alone, and The Most Beautiful Dreams. They want the audience of The 90's Festival to reminisce and sing together.
"We have rehearsed twice. Maybe before the performance we will rehearse twice more. We are enthusiastic to perform at The 90's Festival, because for almost 13 years we have not performed together, even if with Uya, 16 years old," said Fla.
Anton said, the personal condition of the Tofu crew was no longer the same. With weight that has gone up, this affects the sound and breath quality. However, they are happy to be back together and will show their best performance.
"We have known each other since we were 17 years old. His emotional relationship is already close. Besides, Tofu is not separated because of fighting or anger. So when we gather again, yes we are happy," said Anton.
After the reunion, Tofu did not close down to release new works. However, for now they have not planned a brand-new project or prepared a busy stage schedule.
"We can not be like before, because every personnel has a busy schedule. Moreover, Arief also lives in Semarang and he works in an office," Anton said.
Ready to reunion and have fun with Tofu? ***
